supplementary-material.label: FIG S3
supplementary-material.p: Representative flow cytometry gating for phenotypic cell characterization. Parent gating strategy for the analysis of PBMCs. A representative staining profile from the ZIKV cohort is shown. Live, singlet lymphocytes were phenotypically characterized as memory B cells (CD27 + CD20 + CD3 −), memory CD4 + T cells (CD28 +/− CD95 + CD4 + CD3 +), memory CD8 + T cells (CD28 +/− CD95 + CD8 + CD3 +), or NK cells (NKG2a +). Proliferation was assessed for each cell type by the expression of Ki67. Download FIG S3, PDF file, 0.2 MB.
